title: Graduate Research Assistant, WWU Münster
text: Creation of binderhub.wwu.de as part of my Master thesis. I forked and remodeled the back end and Kubernetes setup of BinderHub (part of the Jupyter ecosystem) to minimize the attack surface of the underlying Kubernetes cluster of WWU university.

title: Student Software Developer, PAQATO GmbH, Münster
text: Development of Shopware plugins with PHP and rollout of Prometheus based Monitoring of PAQATO's data flows.

title: Freelance Software developer, Aithena, Amsterdam (Remote)
text: Building a prototype for their company indexing software using Python, Scrapy and Google Cloud Platform to collect data about 1000s of businesses.

title: Junior BI Engineer, Bloomon, Amsterdam (Remote)
text: Building various API's consumed by a in-house data warehouses with Python and Swagger.

title: M.Sc. Information Systems (Wirtschaftsinformatik), WWU Münster
text: Master's degree in Information Systems with emphasis on Software Engineering and Data Analytics, incl. Neural Networks, Clustering and Data Mining.

title: Intern Business Intelligence, Bloomon, Amsterdam
text: Student internship across 6 months at Bloomon's HQ in Amsterdam. Work with Google Sheets, Tableau, Facebook's + Google Ads APIs to collect, process and visualize data of Bloomon's delivery process and marketing spendings.

title: B.Sc. Business Information Systems (Wirtschaftsinformatik), Leipzig University
